meta.title: Prince | CEO of Cineblock
meta.description: Meet Prince, the CEO of Cineblock, democratizing access to film and entertainment financing through compliant, community-powered capital.

hero.name: Prince
hero.title: CEO & Co-Founder, Cineblock
hero.tagline: Authoring a new future for creators by opening capital access to everyone.

about.summary: Prince is a lifelong creator who transformed his passion for entertainment into Cineblock, a platform giving artists and audiences the power to fund the stories they believe in.

origin_story.headline: Caught the entertainment bug early.
origin_story.copy: From high school DJ sets to stand-up comedy partnerships, Prince learned how shared moments move crowds and spark community.

inflection_point.headline: Walkabout to wake-up call.
inflection_point.copy: A personal search for purpose led Prince on a literal walkabout—hitchhiking, listening, and realizing that reality becomes malleable when you author your own story.

mission.headline: Democratize access to capital for creators who have been locked out.

pillars.title: Authorship
pillars.description: Empower creators and communities to write their own future without waiting for a Hollywood greenlight.

pillars.title: Accessibility
pillars.description: Let 1,000 believers contribute $100 each and see their culture thrive.

pillars.title: Compliance
pillars.description: Blend Web3 innovation with the legal certainty artists and investors deserve.

project.name: Cineblock
project.problem: Traditional film and entertainment finance is gated by accredited investors, gatekeepers, and opaque networks.
project.solution: Cineblock opens compliant, community-driven capital rails so creators can raise funds directly from the fans and investors who believe in them.
value_proposition: Onboard creators with a clear path to compliant fundraising.
Activate fan communities with fractional participation in projects they love.
Deliver transparency that builds trust between artists, investors, and regulators.

experience.headline: Welcome to Cineblock, the film investing platform for movie lovers, risk takers, and enterprising filmmakers.
copy: With a click of a button, anyone can back up-and-coming films or shows and share in the next viral sensation.
For the first time, audiences gain insider access to Hollywood’s money machine to research and profit from thousands of film projects.
Pitch, collaborate, and fund your own film or series idea directly from your phone—press play to press fund.

features: Education for emerging filmmakers and musicians
Bridging tools between Web2 familiarity and Web3 ownership

traction.regulatory_readiness: Five years of legal, political, and compliance groundwork completed.
traction.community_building: Creators, professors, and early investors already championing the platform.

call_to_action.headline: Ready to co-author the future of entertainment?

highlights: Prince blends fintech expertise with an entertainer’s instinct for crowd energy.
Believes autonomy, purpose, and access to capital should be within reach for every creator.
Sees fans as co-authors who deserve the upside of the culture they fund.
Grounded in faith, resilience, and a relentless belief that the time to act is always now.

quotes.speaker: Prince
quotes.text: I am the author of my story—and when creators claim that authorship, nothing is unattainable.

quotes.speaker: Prince
quotes.text: I caught the bug in high school about entertainment in general—what it is to create things and see people enjoy what you’re doing.

quotes.speaker: Prince
quotes.text: I'm the author of all of that. If you take that approach to things, then things don’t seem unattainable.

quotes.speaker: Prince
quotes.text: Money moves things. If we can open access to capital, people can finally fulfill their dreams.

quotes.speaker: Prince
quotes.text: What was considered magic 100 years ago is science today. Let’s make autonomy the new normal.

quotes.speaker: Prince
quotes.text: We’re trying to give people the autonomy to create their own path.

quotes.speaker: Prince
quotes.text: The time is always right now.

quotes.speaker: Michael Jagdeo
quotes.text: Through your experience, reality has become malleable—and Cineblock helps others feel that too.

timeline.event: Discovered the thrill of entertainment while DJing and coordinating live events.
Traveled the country, seeking purpose and unlocking a deterministic view of authorship.
Saw the promise and pitfalls of unregulated ICOs, committing to a compliance-first alternative.
Built a platform that lets everyday believers invest in film, music, and cultural projects.

supporters.name: Professor, Orange Coast College
supporters.relation: Early believer and investor who sparked the journey.
supporters.highlight: “If you ever build something, I’ll invest in it.”
